title: Internal documents show Instagram's aggressive campaign to win back teens, including by boosting teen-friendly influencers, adjusting its algorithm, and more (Naomi Nix/Washington Post)
summary: Naomi Nix / Washington Post: Internal documents show Instagram's aggressive campaign to win back teens, including by boosting teen-friendly influencers, adjusting its algorithm, and more â€” The company pursued a yearslong strategy to win teens back even after critics said it wasn't safe, records show.
